name: Mapstermind
description:
Experience a new take on the party game genre with Mapstermind’s array of cute characters, two unique game boards with exciting mechanics, and one evil pair of floating hands!

Choose Your Character

Pick from 9 uniquely adorable Piecelings or don the white gloves of the Mapster!


Complete Cooperative Tasks As the Piecelings

Be a giant clam’s stylist, catch a home run, bring a mermaid her crown, and much more!


Unleash the Mapster’s Devastating Attacks

Utilize the Mapster’s custom control board to set traps and launch attacks to delay the Piecelings!


Compete On Two Unique Game Boards

City

Take a tour of the city and explore its many famous landmarks. Avoid the hustle and bustle of this urban environment and return order to the city!

Seafloor

In this underwater stage, Piecelings help the Mermaid recover her lost items. Beware of the sea life and other aquatic hazards!
